comment: Use the Mute and Deny Follow buttons.
amr:
# ::snt Use the Mute and Deny Follow buttons.
(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / button
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mute"))
            :op2 (b2 / button
                  :name n
                  :op1 "Deny"
                  :op2 "Follow")))

comment: Please do not use language that degrades people because of their sexuality.
amr:
# ::snt Please do not use language that degrades people because of their sexuality.
(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (l / language
            :ARG0-of (d / degrade-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (s / sexuality
                              :poss p)))))

comment: The words you are using are offensive, please refrain from using these terms
amr:
# ::snt The words you are using are offensive, please refrain from using these terms
(a / and
      :op1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you))))
      :op2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / term
                        :mod (t2 / this)))))

comment: Just because someone likes the same sex, doesn't mean they deserve to be made fun of.
amr:
# ::snt Just because someone likes the same sex, doesn't mean they deserve to be made fun of.
(m / mean-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (l / like-01
            :ARG0 (s / someone)
            :ARG1 (s2 / same-sex))
      :ARG2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 s
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-fun-04
                  :ARG1 s))
      :mod (j / just))
